{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PQI |model=Air Card II |revision=(A201) |asin= |fcc_date=06/25/2013 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=WLS6140 |manuf_rev=-D117 |availability= |type=Wi-Fi SD Card |fcc_id=A4S-6W61 |pcb_id=WLS6140-D117 |cpu1_brand=KeyASIC |cpu1_model=SPG101B1B-TB |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=8 |ram1=32 |expansion_if_types=microSD Card slot |expansion_usb_num= |wi1_module=Askey WLS6150 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43362 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=microSD Card slot |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui= }} {{TagLine|Wi-Fi microSD Card Adapter}}
"WLS6140-D117" and "REV0" is silkscreened on the board. :This device is using a '''KeyASIC''' SPG101B1B-TB.
'''Note:''' This device has no built-in Flash - it has a slot on :the SD card for insertion of a microSD card.
===See also=== * [[List of Wi-Fi Flash SD Cards]]
[[Category:Embedded system/Wi-Fi SD Card]]
